name: Event Creator
description: Normal users who create events and manage their own submissions.

name: Department Chair
description: Admins who can approve/reject events within their department.

name: Treasurer
description: Admins who can approve/reject budgets for any event.

name: Super Admin
description: Admins with full access to the system. Can assign roles and view all records.

name: Staff Viewer
description: Optional role for support staff to view event history, but not modify anything.
